trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_SEQ_00<tab>Yubli would have you work with a punutiy.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Miisul Ja.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_TODO_01<tab>Mount a punutiy and perform Bosom Brook for the tourists waiting at Breath Between.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Yubli.

TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_YUBLI_000_000<tab>Are you fond of punutiys, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Many people are, it seems. After starting our new tours at Breath Between, customers have begun making requests to spend time with the beasts.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_YUBLI_000_001<tab>If I could enlist your services as special advisor once more, I'd like you to help answer these requests and gauge how well our visitors respond.

TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_YUBLI_000_002<tab>What say you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Ready to ride a punutiy again? It's become a popular duty among the agency workers, with everyone wanting to take a turn, but you seem to have a natural affinity for the creatures.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_YUBLI_000_003<tab>When you're ready, you'll find Miisul Ja waiting by the river with the particulars of your task. I shall see you upon your return!

TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_MIISULJA_000_004<tab>You'll be our rider today, will you? Good, good, glad to have you aboard! I'll need you to hop straight on the punutiy and take yourself over to where our customers are enjoying the marvels of Breath Between.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_MIISULJA_000_005<tab>When you find them, have your mount show off her “bosom brook” move. The people will love it, and the punutiy gets to enjoy some much-needed water-play!

TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_MIISULJA_000_006<tab>Once you've finished entertaining the visitors, feel free to hop off and report directly to Yubli. Don't worry─the punutiys are trained to come back here to me.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_MIISULJA_000_007<tab>If you're looking for your punutiy, she wandered back a little while ago. Ready to head off again?
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_TOURISTA05215_000_008<tab>This is so exciting. I just love those pudgy punutiy cheeks!
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>Speak with Miisul Ja at Dock Poga to mount a punutiy and perform Bosom Brook for the waiting tourists.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_TOURISTA05215_000_010<tab>Oh, would you look at that! So powerful, so graceful...and the way the water sparkles is so pretty!
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_TOURISTA05215_000_011<tab>It was worth taking the tour just for this. The punutiy seems to be enjoying herself, too! She must like working with you!

TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_TOURISTB05215_000_012<tab>I had them bring me to Breath Between for a spot of fishing, but I was told we could see punutiys here as well. That's an experience I don't mind waiting for.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>Speak with Miisul Ja at Dock Poga to mount a punutiy and perform Bosom Brook for the waiting tourists.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_TOURISTB05215_000_014<tab>Well, I never! Never knew a punutiy could move like that, I mean. Such a clever creature...
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_TOURISTB05215_000_015<tab>Even if I don't catch anything today, I'll be going home happy after that performance!
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_TOURISTC05215_000_016<tab>The guide told me this is the spot to be if we want to see a punutiy...
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_SYSTEM_000_017<tab>Speak with Miisul Ja at Dock Poga to mount a punutiy and perform Bosom Brook for the waiting tourists.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_TOURISTC05215_000_018<tab>What a stunning display...
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_TOURISTC05215_000_019<tab>I can hardly wait to share the tale of this magnificent beast with my kin back home. Thank you so much.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_YUBLI_000_025<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The guides tell me our customers were well pleased with your punutiy performance!

TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_YUBLI_000_026<tab>According to Miisul Ja, punutiys are highly social creatures. They're known to put on these displays of water-based magicks as a sign of affection for those they consider friends.

TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_YUBLI_000_027<tab>The behavior is also said to help lower anxiety and promote the animals' well-being. Our new idea also provides the punutiys with much-needed exercise, and as such, Miisul Ja is only too happy to have us continue with the practice.
TEXT_BANPEL117_05215_YUBLI_000_028<tab>I hope you can find the time to help us again─for the sake of both our customers and the punutiys!
